mapper.select: select * from chat_buddy cb left join chat_members cm on cb.cbbuid=cm.cmid where cb.cmid=#{cmid} and cm.cmdrop is null
select * from chat_members cm, chat_roomjoin cr where cm.cmid=cr.cmid and cr.crid in (select crid from chat_roomjoin where cmid=#{cmid} and crid=#{crid})and cm.cmid not in #{cmid} order by crid
mapper.update: update chat_members set cmscname=#{cmscname} where cmid=#{cmid}
mapper.select: select rownum,msgid,msgmessage,to_char(msgtime,'YYYY-MM-DD') msgshottime,cmid,crid from chat_message where crid=#{crid} and not msgmessage is null and rownum=1 order by msgid desc
select count(*) cnt, crid from chat_members cm, chat_roomjoin cr where cm.cmid=cr.cmid and cr.crid=#{crid} group by crid order by crid

select crid from (select rank() over(PARTITION BY crid ORDER BY msgid desc) rnum, msgid, crid from chat_message where crid in(select crid from chat_message where cmid=#{cmid}))aa where aa.rnum=1 order by aa.msgid desc
select count(msgmessage) from chat_message where not cmid=#{cmid} and crid=#{crid} and msgtime > (select joincontime from chat_roomjoin where cmid=#{cmid} and crid=#{crid})
select * from chat_roomjoin where crid in(select crid from chat_roomjoin where cmid=#{cmid}) and cmid=#{cbbuid}
select count(*) cnt from chat_roomjoin where crid=#{crid} group by crid
select seq_chat_room.currval as crid from dual

select msgid, msgmessage,to_char(msgtime,'PM FMHH:MI:SS') msgshottime, msgsysmsg, cs.cmid, crid, cm.cmprofile,cm.cmname from chat_message cs inner join chat_members cm on cs.cmid=cm.cmid where crid=#{crid} order by msgid
mapper.delete: delete from chat_buddy where cbbuid=#{cbbuid} and cmid=#{cmid}
mapper.update: update chat_message set cmid='unknown' where cmid=#{cmid} and crid=#{crid}
update chat_roomjoin set cmid='unknown' where cmid=#{cmid} and crid=#{crid}
mapper.select: select * from chat_members where cmid in(select cbbuid from chat_buddy where cmid=#{cmid} and not cbbuid in(select cmid from chat_roomjoin where crid=#{crid} and not cmid=#{cmid}))
mapper.update: update chat_roomjoin set joincontime=sysdate where cmid=#{cmid} and crid=#{crid}
